OOC:=
 What is Perceptor's Beastmode??????

As Hydras pondered and then ordered h=
is troops to the shuttle the
golden disk continued to float in midair, the =
cannons mounted on it
orienting on a new target: Hydras!

With a mechanical=
 grinding noise the cannons converge and with an
abrupt fury they open fire=
 on Hydras, even as Myrmidon's inert form
continues to lay on the ground, t=
he last victim of its attack!

Perceptor has difficulty picking up Rodimus'=
 signal at first, then he
picks up a faint signal, one that leads him an ar=
ea of disturbed
earth. Some one has recently dug a rather massive hole and =
then
covered it again. And that someone smells a lot like Skorponok! And
Sk=
orponok has Rodimus!
